Andrew Bautista

Resume

About Me

I'm a Full Stack Web Developer with a managerial background. Strengths include leadership and teamwork skills that efficiently utilize time management as well as effective role assignments to complete collaborative tasks and projects in a timely manner. I'm passionate about learning how to build a connective, impactful experience through creatively engaging user interfaces and meaningful online interactions on the web.


As part of my changing career path, I've recently earned a certificate in Full Stack Development from Rutgers University, establishing skills in JavaScript, CSS, React.js, Node.js, as well as Express.js, mySQL, and MongoDB. I'm not afraid to get hands dirty to problem-solve programming challenges, and I'm positioned to employ my leadership as well as my combined technical skills and knowledge, making me an advantageous contributor to any development team.

Experience

Outreach Calling

Caller/Manager - October 2010 - Sepemter 2019

A fundraising company that makes phone calls on behalf of non profit organizations.

  • Promoted to management after holding the rank of top caller and performer for the call center office.
  • Awarded Employee of the Month for having #1 revenue and sales generated for the month of March.
  • Trained top producing callers that collected a minimum of $10,000 total weekly.
  • Utilized new marketing strategy resulting in a 10% revenue growth in 2014.

Full Stack Web Development - December 2019 - June 2020
